about.summary: Python library for the analysis UV SO2 camera data

name: pyplis
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyplis" %}
{% set version = "1.4.4" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 341a393a614de621e5376b29f4154f80a3fa07c754d89051c4604d7439e013c0

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - python
    - numpy >=1.11
    - scipy
    - pandas
    - astropy
    - matplotlib >=1.5
    - basemap
    - opencv
    - geonum
    - pydoas
    - six

test:
  imports:
    - pyplis
    - pyplis.test

about:
  license: GPL-3.0
  home: https://github.com/jgliss/pyplis
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Python library for the analysis UV SO2 camera data
  doc_url: https://pyplis.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/jgliss/pyplis

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jgliss
